sub_title: Director Sustainable Index Solutions | Presentation Coach
summary:
I'm a seasoned commercially driven investment professional with 15 years of international experience in asset management. I’ve worked 6 years in Europe, 1 year in the United States and 8 years in Hong Kong covering all client segments in Asia-Pacific.
In Asia-Pacific I’ve made a significant contribution to building Robeco’s Quant Equity business from scratch. 1 client and USD 1 billion in 2012 and 25+ clients and >USD 10 billion in 2020.
In addition to 1000+ client pitches, I’ve been a frequent, consistently highly rated, public speaker at international conferences to both institutional and wholesale audiences.

I’ve graduated as a Certified Professional Presentation Coach and Presentation Trainer with the objective to share my pitching insights and public speaking experience with other professionals to enable them to speak authentically and successfully in public as well. 

Please reach out to me if you need help in structuring your presentation/story, improving your presentation skills and feeling more comfortable to speak authentically in public.

Key responsibilities:
- Conducting prospect and investment consultant meetings
- Business development
- Public speaker at investment conferences

- Supporting and educating sales on sustainable and factor indices
- Review and co-author marketing materials
profile_positions.title: Director - Client Portfolio Manager Sustainable Index Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Authentic and effective public speaking is instrumental to personal growth and success. My goal as a presentation coach is to help my coachee remain authentic and become more comfortable and effective when speaking in public. At Robeco I’m the go-to person for colleagues who want to achieve those goals. 

As a Certified Professional Presentation Coach I support colleagues via 1-1 presentation coaching and presentation skills trainings.
profile_positions.title: Presentation Coach and Trainer
